#Text= Mako says : " Let 's see if this guy knows anything .

column1: #Text=We 're looking for a man about sixty , balding , wearing glasses in a long green robe .
#Text=" Bolin says : " And he 's got this weird piercing that goes from his nose to his ear .
#Text=Sounds like a guy who came in last night .
#Text=I told him I had the best drinks in the Earth Kingdom and he called me a liar .
#Text=" Tavern owner says : " Nah , afraid not .
